website_summaries.verdict: Buyers seeking an inexpensive backpacking pillow should check out this reliable model from Teton Sports.
pros: Flannel fabric great for colder weather
Many customers also use for traveling
cons: Customers were surprised by the pillow's remarkably small size

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a motorcycle camping trip from NYC to LA, cannonball run. This pillow was absolutely worthless. It's cute, it's nice to nap on, maybe even use on an airplane; but it was absolutely worthless for camping after a long day of riding. This thing is small - really small. I ended up rolling my jacket up and using that as a pillow instead of this - this is not real camping gear. This is yuppie trash.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: The perfect camping must have
customer_reviews.text: I used this pillow for three weeks whilst camping in Alaska and for every plane ride I've had since. It was fantastic. Perfect size, comfy, really pretty and well made, good quality and everything I hoped it would be. You can easily take the case off for washing and the bag it comes in is easy to carry, doesn't take up much room, and the pillow slides in and out easily. I will probably buy another one because it's so good. It saved my life in Alaska and gave me great nights sleep. The quality of the fabric and pillow is outstanding and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and compact. Gets the job done, can fit nicely in your bag, we used them this weekend - perfect for sleeping, but too small to prop your head up. I put a large mag light flashlight next to it so that you can see the size. Used them on our small boat and it was perfect for traveling light.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: By itself it's a long night of trying to get comfortable. If you are trying to pack light use ...
customer_reviews.text: It comes with the bag. Exactly as I ordered. By itself it's a long night of trying to get comfortable. If you are trying to pack light use one and fold it but, If you are using for a car camping trip and staying a few nights recommend 2. Compact and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Trout Jester

customer_reviews.title: love this pillow, thinking about buying one for each of my boys for summer camp next year
customer_reviews.text: before buying this, i used a jacket as my pillow on campouts. the jacket worked but i was getting ready for a week long camping trip to Boy Scouts Camp, and i needed a better pillow. I dont trust the inflatable ones because there are "pokey" things around while camping, so i got this pillow. now i wont go camping without it. it is very comfortable, and nice to have even though it is small. the photo is a bit dark but i have a tarp/tent configuration set up for sleeping in and the red and black pillow is visible in there. this is the only real photo i have of the pillow in my tent.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions are specified in the product description as 12" x 18". This is also written on the stuff sack. As you can see in the attached photo, the pillow is more like 11" x 16". The specified weight is correct - with the stuff sack, I measured 9.7 oz. Haven't actually tried camping with it, and I'm not too picky so I'm sure it will be fine, but the product description should be corrected.
customer_reviews.author: langelgjm

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow...
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered yesterday...slept on it last night. The fiber fill was very supportive and hopefully will last longer than foam. By supportive, the pillow is "pillow shaped", not normally thought of as ergonomic. But after working with it, I was able to move the filling around enough to give me neck support both on my back and sides. The cover is very soft and the pillow fits well in the sack that comes with it. I may look for a small compression sack to get it a little smaller. My only suggestion to the manufacturer is to have a way to secure the bag to the pillow to make packing up a little quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Ushijima

customer_reviews.title: Decent pillow but....
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent little pillow but for camping I wish I would have gone with one of the inflatable air pillows. Although this pillow is soft and packs down ok, there really is no head support unless you fold it in half and then it is so small its not really worth it. If your using it in a car or something then maybe its OK. But if your are backpacking/Camping and want a travel pillow I would personally go with an inflatable pillow. Sounded good in theory but in my intended purpose , I am a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Drunk Cow

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this pillow is not 12x18 (not sure where those measures come from. Second, the cover isn't cotton flannel, but it's soft. It is tiny and kind of soft. I found it floating around, even in my silk sleeping bag liner, whether in my hammock or a tent. Might be better as a neck pillow or a child's pillow? It stuffs into the sack provided, but it is not as compact as my hammock!
customer_reviews.author: AAPREMLALL

customer_reviews.title: Not supportive
customer_reviews.text: This is a small pillow and I knew that when purchasing it. I was under the impression it would "fluff" up a tad more than it did. I needed more support than it provided. I used my blow up pillow and put this over it and it was enough. Not my plan to use two pillows for camping but it worked when combined with another pillow. I will keep it because its better than nothing in a pinch but I doubt there is a true comfy small camping pillow with support anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: tedwards70

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Not for camping or for human use...its made for a doll. Its slightly larger than an envelope. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: New favorite for woods and home.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and easy to carry pillow. I've used SEVERAL different inflatable camp pillows and always had them eventually leak beyond the point of usefulness. No air no worries this guy's comfy everytime. I even use it as a throw pillow at home.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works and it's cheap
customer_reviews.text: I used this during camping after I ran 50 miles through the Bob Marshall Wilderness. Let me tell you, it was plenty comfortable after that. I was tired and sore and couldn't sleep but I laid on this and listened to a wolf howl through the night. I was uncomfortable everywhere, but didn't need to punch and re-shape my pillow. It packs down pretty small, too. I think this is a pretty darned good backpacking/camping pillow. I'll be bringing it in the future when I travel by air because I think it'll be great for that, too.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Man

customer_reviews.title: well built with minor flaws in fill
customer_reviews.text: Its decent in weight and size for hammock camping or fotting in hood of mummy bags. The fill is that of like cotton and bunches up and takes a lot to fluff it out even. The material takes a few washes to get soft but is nice after that. The comfort is 6.5/10 but it beats inflatable pillows and is well built. I have already gone on a great trip with it and am still on it as i write this, it is doing very well in damp and chilly weather.
customer_reviews.author: MaseG19

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camping pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camping pillow. If you need to save space, don't want to spend more than $20, and you want to be able to wash the pillowcase, these are the pillows for you. I looked around for quite some time for camping pillows. Many of the reviews for down filled pillows said they became flat after a couple of hours. Others I found were way too expensive. These were just right. They are squishy and don't become flat even after 3 nights of use. The pillow case can be taken off to be washed. They compress down to a manageable size too!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa O.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy, easy to carry, wish it was larger
customer_reviews.text: Just tried my portable camping pillow this past weekend. Expanded generously from its carrying bag, stayed within its washable pillowcase, and provided more support than without it. It was very comfortable all night. My only gripe was I wish it was a bit larger. I don't mind a moderate increase in carrying size so long as I can compress a larger size as much as possible to the carrying bag. Otherwise, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VS1979

customer_reviews.title: Small form factor but not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great if you are looking for a basic pillow in a pinch that doesn’t take up much space along with your camping supplies. Unfortunately it is not very comfortable and is lacking in support and comfort ability. We bought two of these to match with our Teton sleeping bag, couldn’t be happier with the sleeping bag but these pillows just aren't comfortable. Personally I will be having to purchase different pillows for camping. So this was a waste of money essentially. I hope this can help others to not make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: mh

customer_reviews.title: Good value for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great travel and camping pillow for the price. I used it both on the plane and while camping in Zion National Park. Had no issues at all carrying it in my backpack in my carry-on. Packs down fairly small. Remember, it's a camp pillow so it's not nearly as big as one you would have at home but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN M DEMAR

customer_reviews.title: I love my Teton camp pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is my third camp/travel pillow and the first that is truly compressible. I passed up some really flimsy options and bought the Teton based on reviews. This pillow is not too big or small and it has a lot of loft to it. It packs to about the size of a football and is almost as firm as a regular sized travel pillow. I bought the black/red tartan, Teton is known for its fabrics and this one is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Just OK little pillow
customer_reviews.text: Not great, but ok. The pillow came with a crease in the middle where the material separated a little. My daughter used it for a sleepover and it was fine for that. I wouldn't use it for camping or if I needed to use it for more than one or two nights in a row. You might want to spend a couple more dollars on a nicer one. It did smell a little and I didn't want to wash it because I didn't want to make the material inside separate any more, so I sprayed it with febreeze and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine0404

customer_reviews.title: A bit flat
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfy, but don't look at this for a firm pillow. I had a difficult night of sleep with it in a tent on a sleeping pad. You can fold it in half to get the right firmness, but then it becomes tiny and you'll easily roll off of it in your sleep. Was a little more comfortable when stuffing it directly under my neck instead of just placing the back of my head on it.
customer_reviews.author: SMitch

customer_reviews.title: Great Camp Pillow
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than I had imagined it would be, but it was my first time camping and first time buying anything like this. It's a great pillow with good support. I think this would be too big for backpacking, but if you are just car camping, this is great. I like that it has a case that is washable. I had bought two pillows and brought them with me. But a friend had not brought any pillows so I lent him one for the weekend. I slept just fine with the support it provided.
customer_reviews.author: I Spend Too Much Here

customer_reviews.title: Desperately needed a non-inflatable pillow for camping/backpacking
customer_reviews.text: I was getting terrible nights of sleep using the Sea to Summit Aeros pillow while camping and backpacking...the rolling balloon-y feel of it was driving me crazy as a side sleeper. I needed to try an actual filled pillow to see if it would be any better and it was! I need something thick and dense and this fits the bill more than any inflatable pillow would. Worst case scenario I can fluff it up or even fold it over if I need it thicker. For the price this definitely does the job; not perfect but pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: My favorite portable pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow for camping and for using with my hammocks. It is my favorite pillow because it has soft material, provides the perfect amount of support for my head when I'm in a hammock, and is very affordable. In fact, it was one of the cheapest pillows out there! If I need another pillow, this will be the one I order again.
customer_reviews.author: kittymom09

customer_reviews.title: Great for your Hammock and Its light
customer_reviews.text: Been using it every night for 2 years in my hammock, I never wake up with neck pain (or back pain for that matter but that has more to do with sleeping in a hammock). it has lost some fluff in the heavy use, and I may replace it with a new one. But if you just use it for camping you'll probably lose it before you need to replace it because of ware.
customer_reviews.author: A.Hilts

customer_reviews.title: No valve or self inflation. Just a small pillow
customer_reviews.text: No valve or self inflation. Just a small pillow See photos. I’m sure it’s good but very small and not compact. Note the DIFFERENT but same company product in the photos. The orange/gray one is self inflating.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Pen

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because I needed a pillow of some sort for backpacking, but this is simply too small for me. My kids loved it, though, so I got one for each of them. They take it camping. So, for a man I would not rate this too highly, though perhaps there are some younger men or minimalists for whom this would be fine. My kids think it is fine, so I split the difference in my rating.
customer_reviews.author: M. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable but it's affordable and can fit anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pillow if you have nothing else and no other options. It is not that comfortable but it is great for compact storage for those long trips where a large pillow would take up too much room. It's not comfy at all but hey you get what you pay for. For trips (car and stuff maybe not camping as I would get a memory foam pillow if you have the extra cash) it's good. Otherwise, one pillow is better than no pillow or using your daypack.
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Decent support
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat lumpy, but it does offer just enough support, which is surprising given the small size. Two was ideal for me. If you’re short on space e.g., backpacking, I’d get a blow-up model, as even in a stuff sack, this takes up space. For us (car + tent) campers, it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Likes regular stuff

customer_reviews.title: Too tiny for my big 'ole head
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize these pillows would be so tiny! I guess they might work in a pinch but not if you are looking for comfort. This itty bitty pillow was not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Super  Momoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Size is smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Wenzel pillows for my boys and this one for me for our upcoming camping trip. I thought this was bigger, but the dimensions in the description are far larger than the actual pillow. The Wenzel is bigger and 1/2 the price!! Going to return this as it would be a better pillow for my toddler at daycare than camping.
customer_reviews.author: tommy1691

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and compact
customer_reviews.text: When I first took the pillow out of the storage sack I thought the pillow was a bit small but after using on a recent camping trip I found the size not to be an issue at all. Very comfortable and love how compact it packs up. Also great for long car rides... Love the pillow and so does my son who usually uses a large size pillow at home. Great price, very comfortable and storage sack all make for an awesome item!
customer_reviews.author: oldmandrummer

customer_reviews.title: DIY your camping pillow
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad pillow but if you are a side sleeper it might not be enough so you could do what I did and slice it open, add some shredded memory foam, and put it back together. Now it’s amazing and still small. Not small enough for the stuff sack but hey it’s washable and you can just put it in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camping pillow
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect it to give you the feel of being in your bed at home, and it's a painless luxury to have in the camp. If I had to find something wrong with this, it's that it could compress more in the included sack for backpacking. Also, it wasn't apparent to me when buying, but the plaid pattern (that isn't red) is pink, clearly for a woman. The cover is remove able, and I bought it for my girlfriend anyway, so no harm no foul! Purchased the red plain for myself. Love Teton products! If you camp as a couple and haven't checked out the Mammoth XXL bags, do it now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty unsure how good these little pillows would be but they are wonderful! Normally when the whole family is in the car with it packed for camping the pillows are piled up between the kids. The kids argue about who has less space because of it etc. I bought these little pillows for all of us. We just went on an extended camping trip and we all were quite comfortable at night. Perfect firmness and support. They are really easy to stuff back into their little sack. When I got home I took the removable covers off and washed them and now they are ready for the next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack and great for a good night's rest on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pillows for a two night camping trip. Despite their size and portability, they were surprisingly very comfortable for both myself and my boyfriend. They were also very easy to roll up and get back into the bag (something I usually struggle with for other products) and were easy to pack and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Jiyoung

customer_reviews.title: Nice for backpacking, can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pillow. After messing with inflatable pillows and larger pillows I discovered this gem. Fits into a compact size but unrolls into a nice little pillow. I like to put this pillow on top of my backpack for a large, soft headrest. I also like that the pillow case comes off the pillow for easy washing. Anyone camping or backpacking knows how nasty you can get. I would absolutely buy this pillow again.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Springer

customer_reviews.title: Great item very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are great 👍 I got tired of my inflatable camping pillow leaking out air and breaking on me plus they where not all that comfortable. It decided to go for these instead and they are great for our tent camping trips and even car naps. Im very happy with them and feel I sleep better too rather than the other pillows I had used.
customer_reviews.author: Shiva S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Travel Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great if you're tight on space. It's a nice little pillow for the car when you roadtrip or on an airplane where space is at a premium. I was surprised at the amount of stuffing crammed into such a small pillow. It's small yet supportive and generally maintains its shape even after sleeping on it overnight. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D K

customer_reviews.title: Better for kids than adults
customer_reviews.text: If you camp with a large family, pillows take up a lot of space. We got two to test out. They work great for the kids, but weren’t thick enough for us adults. I rather expected this would be the case. We will store them uncompressed out of the bag in the “off season” just like we do for our nicer sleeping bags.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Mom

customer_reviews.title: ... years (even the $100+ ones specifically made for side-sleepers like me) were comfortable
customer_reviews.text: At home I usually sleep without a pillow because none of the half-dozen pillows I've tried over the last few years (even the $100+ ones specifically made for side-sleepers like me) were comfortable. I bought this pillow on impulse and was shocked at how comfortable it is. I used it on a recent 16-day road trip, and have been using it (for two weeks now) every day at home. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: YB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Prefer this to my inflatable pillow regardless of the weight difference for any trail any day of the week. Update: I have used this pillow as lumbar support in my sliding rocker for the past two weeks and I now have a whole new go to lounge spot. Great loft for the dimensions given.
customer_reviews.author: Codey Mac

customer_reviews.title: Neither my Girlfriend or I found these comfortable for camping
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these because of their small size but find that they are two small and compress to easily to offer any real support. If you want to protect the back of your head they are soft but anything other than laying on them looking straight up and they aren't all that practical. The price is good and the quality is there but they just don't have enough loft.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Such a space saver!
customer_reviews.text: We go camping a lot but used to always bring our regular house pillows which took up a ton of space during transport. These little pillows pack into a ball bout the size of a fist! I have to say, I wish there was a bigger size option, but I got 2 for me and 2 for my husband and we were very comfortable. Cannot say enough for the space saving attributes!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Packs down smaller than expected and decompresses to be fluffier than expected!
customer_reviews.text: It packs down smaller than expected and poofs up from that state larger than expected. It's perfect to tuck into the "mummy hood" of your sleeping bag or while laying in a hammock. I think people tend to underestimate the value of comfort in a survival/camping experience. I recently purchased a bunch of TETON brand products due to good reviews (and competitive price). So far they all exceed my expectations. Good job TETON!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Virtually perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it four stars was because It's tough to get the pillow back into the bag for travel or storage, while it's not soft enough to fit back into the bag without much struggle, it was also not as firm as I would have liked it. I would have preferred either a softer pillow for easier storage or a firmer pillow for support.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Shatto

customer_reviews.title: The best little pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow after the need to throw out My Pillow when I saw that idiot couldn't keep his business out of politics. Poor business decision. This pillow is so much nicer, more comfortable, more supportive and much nicer looking. I'm so pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Derek S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sized pillow for camping
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was small but the perfect size to sleep on while camping or could even be used for a car pillow. I love the plaid rustic design. It was soft and cushioned, much better than no pillow or sleeping on foam blowup pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Kerr

customer_reviews.title: For the size, they are good!
customer_reviews.text: When camping, you don't expect to feel like you are at home in bed... these little pillows are just enough to keep your head off of the tent floor and give you some cushion. They come with their own travel bags and are "squishy" enough to fold over if you need more cushion. We were glad we had them!
customer_reviews.author: Royce Michna

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: If I hadn't thrown out the packaging I'd have returned this. Just pack an extra hoodie and roll it up to sleep on, this is pointless and offers no support.
customer_reviews.author: Agius

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and not too hard so I can sleep on it
customer_reviews.text: I have a neck with damaged disks so it's hard for me to sleep comfortably with pillows that provide too much support or are normal sized (I feel like I'm smothering) but this product is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Card

customer_reviews.title: Great Camping Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my husband and myself for camping and love them. They fluffed up easily after taking them out, were very comfy, and fit nicely in the pillow pouch on our sleeping bags. I recommended them to my brother and he bought three more for my children as gifts. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GreatNorthGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice size but no support
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for my needs but fill gives no support....like not having a pillow at all. May work ok for a small child, but the weight of an adult head just collapses it completely. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: It's a camp pillow. It's SUPPOSED to be small. Doy.
customer_reviews.text: If you're wanting a large pillow, you are looking in the wrong place, because this is a camping/hammock pillow and, for that, it works just fine. Fits nicely in an Eno (or similar) hammock and stows easily in a backpack, all for less than you would pay for a name brand camping pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Dickman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Amazing Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very comfortable! In an effort to downsize all of my belongings, I decided to get rid of the nasty pillows that I had. I wanted something that was both compact and comfortable, so I decided to give this Teton Sports pillow a try. It arrived on time, and ever since I've slept on it, I can't see myself using another pillow! Also, with the included compression bag, it compresses down to a very compact size. As I am on the road a lot, portability is extremely important. For camping, as your main pillow, or even sleeping in your car (again, I am on the road a LOT), this pillow definitely fits the bill! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Action

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for camping!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two (2) of these pillows for camping. We used them for the first time a few weeks ago and were really impressed! They were the right size for our sleeping bags, very comfortable and we both slept great. In addition, it’s really nice that the covers are easy to remove and wash after camping. They also pack up / store nicely. Overall, we had a great night sleep and I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Hikers! Less weight! Less space!
customer_reviews.text: Always trying to lighten my carrying pack when I'm out on a long weekend hike and this pillow comes with a nifty little pouch and is really light weight, super tiny but useful. Love this pillow! Quality sleep is important after a long day of moving, definitely recommend this to overnight hikers taking all their equipment with them on their backs!
customer_reviews.author: Cristoff McGroff

customer_reviews.title: Super small
customer_reviews.text: Maybe would work for a small child that only sleeps in 1 spot and doesnt move, if you roll your head the pillow will no longer be under your head. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but takes a lot of space when rolled up
customer_reviews.text: Great little pillow if you have space to pack it or car camping. I doubt I would pack it in for an over-nighter in a 40 liter bag, it's just too big, but would make room for it for any extended trip with a larger pack.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie BuckTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on at least 20 camping and backpacking trips. Its light, sturdy, durable, and comfortable. I've used an inflatable pillow when I've forgotten it, and its not even close. Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: JMPortland

customer_reviews.title: I actually love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this pillow. I have washed it in a front loading machine and let it dry in the sun. Came out perfect. I have used it backpacking and on two 6 hr flights now. Works great. It is small but thats the best part! Fits perfectly in my backpack and doesn't add too much weight. I can fold it a certain way against the window seat and lights out.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Would be good if the filling was all one piece.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it felt as though 2 separate chunks of the filling were put into this pillow, leaving a big gap in between. Tried to smooth it out, but no luck. It felt lumpy as well. I was hopeful about this pillow since it is not as thick as others (I'm a back sleeper), but it just didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel pillow. Pillow case and inner super soft material
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Cover is soft easy to clean. The inner pillow is just as soft and cleanable. Medium fill. The exceeded my expectations. Would consider a full size version if it was available. Super comfort.
customer_reviews.author: AugustWest

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, I slept great! Maybe not ideal for long backpacking trips where every cm and oz counts, but for short trips and any camping, this is perfect. And in that case, I felt it was more comfortable than inflatable ones, if you're able to expend the size/weight. My friend brought their normal pillow from home and they even said they preferred this pillow to theirs. It's great, you should buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Effy B

customer_reviews.title: Great backpacking pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little pillow. I hate sleeping with my head on the ground and I don't like using wadded up clothes as a pillow, so I bought this. Used it on a 3 night trip and it worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Zackery Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: Pillows gone flat
customer_reviews.text: These are great for kids not so much for man sized adults, didn't fit my big head,..... good intent they just aren't comfy. They remind me of the airplane pillows when airplanes would have them that is.
customer_reviews.author: Mark V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: Inside a Teton sleeping bag on a COLD night hunting elk in Colorado, they can’t be beat; compress to next to nothing; weighs next to nothing; but, for me, buy more than one; I like lots of pillow!
customer_reviews.author: shadetree351

customer_reviews.title: I like that the pillowcases come off so that they can ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these pillows for our camping trip coming up. They r perfectly small pillows. I like that the pillowcases come off so that they can be washed. We r going tent and hammock camping for a month and so these will be great in the hammocks too. They rolled up small enough to be able to get them back in their bags which is awesome!! I don't need a bunch of space taking pillows in my car when I can have three small ones made even smaller by their pouches. I can't wait to take them on our trip!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Great Camp Pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pillow! I tent camp often with my friends and don’t like lugging around my normal sized pillow and taking up precious space. This pillow compresses great. It has a good amount of support considering how small it is.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly thick enough
customer_reviews.text: Good for a between-the-knees pillow, but not early thick enough for a "main pillow". Obviously I'm a side-sleeper. if you are a back-sleeper and like paper-thin pillows, this is for you. If you're getting this for use on a plane or something, I bet it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: I used this pillow during an extended camping trip and it worked very well. I'm really happy that it comes with a removable cover to make washing much easier. I was surprised by how small the actual pillow was as I'm a larger person. However, after backpacking with it I really wouldn't want it any bigger taking up extra pack space. I've decided it's an excellent size.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Took this pillow with me into Boundary Waters and was WORTH it! Very lightweight and easy to pack. The cover is so soft and luxurious. The pillow is soft and also holds it's shape to give your head that support you need while sleeping on the ground. I am SO glad I bought this when I did. My friends were even jealous and wanted one too! hahah
customer_reviews.author: DaVincent

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Son used on science camp trip. No complaints. Now he uses as car pillow on long trips. Nice pillow case that is easy to wash. Packs down in small bag but may be too big for trying to travel light when backpacking. Feels comfortable and the 18x12 feels big enough for me a 5’ 6” adult with 7 1/4 hat size.
customer_reviews.author: Yo-man

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for camping
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a 9 year old's camping outside and he liked it very much. Provides plenty of support, it is easy to stuff back into the bag it came from and has a removable/washable pillowcase. Small enough to not blow up the camping backpack and useful enough to provide a good night sleep for kids.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gafton

customer_reviews.title: BUY!!! GREAT FOR TRAVELING AND CAMPING
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great for traveling or camping, has a removable pillow case, and is small but has a good amount of support and so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: This did the trick
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for me. I wasn't looking for a big comfy pillow.. just a little something so my head wouldn't be on the ground and that would fit in my pack. This did the trick. If you're looking for big fluffy comfort, maybe look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for our most recent camping trip. total lifesaver! compact and ideal for a camping scenario. totally recommend this for hiking into the campsite or a simple drive up and park campsite!
customer_reviews.author: gus oropeza

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: For a travel pillow, it's not bad. Packs well, supported my head (I'm a stomach sleeper), and fit well in my "personal item" carry on.
customer_reviews.author: SilvaRee

customer_reviews.title: What is advertised
customer_reviews.text: Small, Compact, and Portable. Exactly what you expect a camp pillow to be. For what it cost, and for it's primary use (to sleep on) it's fine. Depending on the rest of your sleeping arrangements, it does the job it's intended to do. Honestly it's more like a 4.5, but I gave this that extra half star because it was cheap
customer_reviews.author: ShadowfoX

customer_reviews.title: Solid little pillow
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for local backpacking and appreciated it. It's pretty darn light but helps comfort my head enough to get a decent sleep. It is a small pillow, but all the backpack type pillows I think are, at least in general.
customer_reviews.author: TRG

customer_reviews.title: Description is a lie.  It's tiny.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is tiny. It says 12x18. This pillow is 6x12. Not even a small child would be able to use this. Those tiny airplane pillows are larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On pillow #2
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this pillow (after I sadly left my old one on an airplane). I require a firm pillow and this one does the trick. It's comfortable and a nice size for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect “knee” pillow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use between my knees when sleeping and it’s perfect. Great quality, just the right size and plenty of loft for use as pillow when camping.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W

customer_reviews.title: No prop 65 warning! Yay
customer_reviews.text: Packs up small, no toxic smell, washes easy. No prop.65 warning yay!!! Matches my kids sleeping bag. Love Teton company. Easy to deal with great warranty, I buy lots of their gear! Quality stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Opal-Lia Palmer

customer_reviews.title: A place to lay my head
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is, a small pillow that is portable. I am currently using mine Bikepacking for the last three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, packs small, and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping in Glacier and really liked it. Its very comfortable, and packs down fairly small. I know a lot of backpackers don't want the extra weight or sacrifice space for a pillow, but I like to be comfortable when I camp that way the experience is more enjoyable. Using your backpack or clothes for a pillow sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. And Mrs. S

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage, less than 1/5th of it has batting in it.
customer_reviews.text: Complete crap. Not actually a pillow, just a bag of stuffing that's about 1/5th full of batting. Complete waste of money and a garbage misleading product.
customer_reviews.author: Statisfied

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I love the pillows, they come with their own bag and the outside cover slips off to wash. The pillows are a bit smaller than I would like but they work nicely with support
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Swilling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel pillow! Gets flat quickly though, wish the filling was more dense.
customer_reviews.text: Thing is a pretty solid pillow! It is very compact. I wish it had a bit more density to it though, it gets flat very quickly. Don't know how compact it would be with denser filling.... Still like it quite a bit! Used it a few times camping already and it always does the job. I'd buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Jared B

customer_reviews.title: Camping Need!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for a recent car camping weekend trip. Not small/light enough for a backpacking trip, but we totally loved them for a camping weekend at our local state park. Recommend them- super comfy, good support, and grab designs!
customer_reviews.author: konabeardog

customer_reviews.title: Compact pillow with little to no support
customer_reviews.text: I liked how small the pillow folded up. It would make it very convenient for traveling. However, for camping, the pillow is very flat and offers no support. I would need at least 2 pillows to support my head while sleeping in a tent. Personally, I would rather have a pillow that is larger for transporting but more comfortable when using for camping. On an airplane, the pillow would nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for in a camp pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality material. Sturdy build. Compact and comfortable for it's size. The storage bag is an extra plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jr.

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I've used mine for camping several times - 4days ea I was pleasantly surprised that it was as comfy as my home pillow and gave decent support I've machine washed the cover after each trip, dunno if I'd wash the pillow itself (I'm 6'2" - 190lbs - 70yrs old) fwiw
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Tiny little guy
customer_reviews.text: Needed a super lightweight pillow to keep for those unexpected camping trips. This pillow is super comfortable and totally makes a difference. It's a single person small roll up pillow that gives a touch of comfort. Great addition that's exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Small and mighty comfy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned about this pillow when I placed the orders for this. I have never owned a small size camp pillow. After receiving it, I immediately took it out of the package and tried it out. I was amazed by the comfort I received from such a small pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love My New Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have a few camp pillows. This one has support. Very light same size as other pillows. If backpacking it does fill up pack space. I still take this one with me for almost all back country trips.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but doesn't pack down as tight as others.
customer_reviews.text: Space and weight are everything, but I chose this pillow for comfort. Sacrifice pack down size (my bag is not much bigger than this) for comfort. Worth it in my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for stuffing and hanging off your backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow for stuffing and hanging off your backpack. Used this on a 13-hour Amtrak ride there, and 13 back a few days later. Loved it. We got one for each person in the family, and they were all pleased with how nicely it stuffed down, while being substantial when pulled out of the sack and fluffed up.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Cole

customer_reviews.title: You'll rest easy with this great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this camping and on a 5000 mile cross country trip. It's the perfect size. I also like the stuff bag that comes with it. If you need a firm neck-roll, just fold it in half. Great price, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Zanone

customer_reviews.title: Great Camping Pillow
customer_reviews.text: It was a great pillow for camping! We went backpacking and used them a couple nights in a row. They're pretty small, but super comfortable. They fit great in a hiking bag & are super light so I think they're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TETON Sports Camp Pillow; Great for Travel, Camping and Backpacking; Washable
product_meta.description: The Camp Pillow by TETON Sports has the same innovative fiber fill that comes in our warm, comfortable sleeping bags. This soft pillow is washable and packs down tight so you can travel anywhere. Just right for camping, backpacking and road tripping. But don’t take our word for it. Check out the reviews! This Camp Pillow is helping hundreds of travelers stay comfortable everywhere they go.The measurements of the pillow are taken when the pillow is pulled taught from end to end.
feature_bullets: SMALL PILLOW THAT’S BIG ON COMFORT: Extra soft travel pillow is the perfect support when it’s time to relax; Just right for camping, backpacking and road tripping
WASHABLE: Designed to be taken anywhere; This travel pillow and pillowcase can be washed together or separately
NO INFLATING NECESSARY: Pillow lofts up on its own; Whether you’re sleeping under the stars, driving cross-country or on an airplane, you’ll rest easy
MATCHING CAMPING GEAR: Each pillow matches the lining of one or more TETON Sports Sleeping Bags and packs down tight
TETON SPORTS PROMISE: Reach out to our AMAZING product support team if you have any questions or concerns; YOU CAN COUNT ON US to get you taken care of and back OUTDOORS with TETON Sports

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
